home.description: This portfolio documents my internship journey as part of the Programming Graduate program at AP Hogeschool. Here, I share my experiences, learnings, and growth throughout my workplace learning period.

about.title: Aspiring Full Stack Developer
about.educationText: I'm currently pursuing my Programming degree at AP Hogeschool, specializing in full-stack development. While I have a natural aptitude for backend systems, I'm actively expanding my frontend expertise to become a versatile developer capable of handling all aspects of modern web development.
about.languagesText: Fluent in three languages: Spanish (native), Dutch (professional proficiency), and English (professional proficiency). This multilingual capability enables effective collaboration in international teams and understanding of technical documentation across languages.
about.aiPhilosophyText: I approach AI as a powerful collaborative tool that enhances rather than replaces developer expertise. My focus is on using AI for code quality improvements, architectural guidance, and efficient problem-solving while maintaining complete understanding and ownership of the codebase.
about.aiApproachText: In my workflow, I employ AI for specific tasks: analyzing code patterns, generating documentation drafts, and exploring alternative implementation strategies. I maintain strict ethical standards by never sharing sensitive code or proprietary information with AI systems.
about.aiExample: This portfolio's development incorporated AI for structural recommendations and efficiency optimizations, while maintaining full control and understanding of all implementation details.
